content.rendered:
Tony is an ex seagoing Chief Engineer with a background in serving on some of the largest superyachts worldwide. He has extensive experience in yacht technical management and prior to his seagoing career was an electrical engineer working for a major power plant company. He has provided expert testimony in US cases.

Contact

Fort Lauderdale, FL | +1 754 802 4139

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Superyachts – Condition and damage evaluation surveys
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert reports
